definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Objective To establish a qualitative standard of Shehua granules .

sentences.english: The oral drug is the first in an HIV drug class called integrase inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 这种新型的口服抗艾滋病毒药物属于整合酶抑制剂。

sentences.english: The cost-effective of the controlled group showed a remarkable advantage over FDC.
sentences.chinese: 对照组药物的成本效果分析优于FDC制剂。

sentences.english: Effective inhibitor of protein kinase C (PKC)-catalyzed histone phosphorylation.
sentences.chinese: 有效的PKC催化组蛋白磷酸化抑制剂。

sentences.english: P-glycoprotein inhibited by Ver has no significant effect on PTS metabolism at the experiment conditions.
sentences.chinese: 糖蛋白抑制剂不影响PTS在实验条件下的代谢。

sentences.english: Additional validation may include investigation of samples from dosed subjects.
sentences.chinese: 额外的验证可能包括样品制剂后的调查。

sentences.english: The next part of dissertation is to design ligand for specific target proteins.
sentences.chinese: 论文的第二部分是进行两类实际蛋白质的抑制剂设计。

sentences.english: Conclusions:Selective iNOS inhibitor-aminoguanidine has protective effect on the transplanted pancreas in rats.
sentences.chinese: 选择性抑制剂氨基胍在大鼠胰腺移植中起到保护作用。

sentences.english: During or within 14 days of MAOIs.
sentences.chinese: 过程中或在14天的单胺氧化抑制剂。

sentences.english: Intravenous preparations take more risk than oral preparation and externally applied agent.
sentences.chinese: 静脉给药制剂相对口服和外用制剂而言，风险较大。

sentences.english: Intravenous preparations take more risk than oral preparation and externally applied agent.
sentences.chinese: 静脉给药制剂相对口服和外用制剂而言，风险较大。

sentences.english: Doctors usually prefer people with diabetes to take blood pressure drugs called ACE inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 医生经常糖尿病人吃的降压药叫做ACE抑制剂。

sentences.english: A number of oral, small-molecule FTIs have been synthesized and tested in clinical trials.
sentences.chinese: 一些口服的，小分子抑制剂已合成并在临床试验测试。

sentences.english: Intravenous forms of indomethacin and ibuprofen are not available in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗目前尚无消炎痛和布洛芬的静脉制剂供应。

sentences.english: In addition, the film formulation also has a dissolve time that is twice as fast as tablets.
sentences.chinese: 另外，该薄膜制剂的溶解时间较舌下片快2倍。

definition: delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
